snippet: John Oliver, as guest host of “The Daily Show With Jon Stewart,” has shown that a series with good writers and an appealing cast can be incisive and funny even without its star.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley reflects that John Oliver's turn as guest host of The Daily Show With Jon Stewart shows that a series with good writers and an appealing cast can be incisive and funny even without its star.
